src:
Laso: Gaji se neki novi NBA stil, Nakić će biti odličan
Trener Reala odlično raspoložen nakon pobede njegovog tima u Beogradu

07 Nov 2019

Crvena zvezda nije uspela da dođe do novog trijumfa u Evroligi pred domaćom publikom. Držali su se crveno-belih čitave tri četvrtine, a onda početkom četvrte potpuno potonuli, nisu postigli poene čitavih pet minuta i dozvolili su Real Madridu da uzgdignutih ruku napusti Beograd.
Trener Kraljevića, Pablo Laso, bio je veoma pričljiv nakon pobede njegovog tima. Istakao je, da je ova razlika možda bila i prevelika."Želeo bih da čestitam mom timu. Nakon tri utakmice smo uspeli da odigramo dobro u gostima. Teško je bilo u prvih 30 minuta, ali u poslednjoj četvrtini smo bili odlični, imali smo dosta otvorenih šuteva. Ličilo je kao da je sve stalo u poslednju deonicu, ali Crvena zvezda je pre toga pogađala neke teške šuteve i tako se održavala u igri. Na kraju je ovih 15 poena možda i previše velika razlika", istakao je strateg Madriđana.
O pitanju vezanom za favorita Evrolige, Laso je bio zagonetan. Zapravo, istakao je da je isuviše rano kako bi se davale bilo kakve prognoze."Da li mislite da Fenerbahče nije favorit? Za mene u Evroligi je trenutno teško da kažem ko je favorit. Sada je velika borba za plej-of, da se uđe u završnicu i stekne prednost domaćeg terena, sve je izjednačeno. Previše je rano da se kaže ko je favorit, veoma je teško dobiti svaku utakmicu", rekao je Laso.
Mnoge je zanimalo da li je Pablo Laso imao možda i previše kredita kod sudija tokom čitave utakmice."Ništa nisam rekao u prvom poluvremenu, pa ako su sudije mislile da sam imao dovoljno kredita, onda mi je drago".
Nakon toga, pričalo se i o mladim nadama Reala. Pre svega, večeras se istakao Garuba, koji je odličnom igrom u reketu pomogao svom timu da dođe do pobede."Voleo bih kada bi svi mogli da igraju u Real Madridu. Srećan sam što uvek imamo dobre igrače koji iskaču i guraju od nazad. Garuba u ACB ligi startuje gotovo stalno, dobro se bori na ovom nivou. To dobro govori o našem sistemu, Garuba pomaže dosta i nadam se da moj tim pomaže njemu", rekao je Laso.
Potom se Laso dotakao i Marija Nakića, za koga tvrdi da je pred njim prilično dug put razvoja."Ovo je možda i najteža godina u njegovoj karijeri. Kada igraš u mlađim kategorijama svi ti govore kako da igraš i kako znaš. Tvrdim da će biti odličan, on još treba da raste, ovo je njegova prva profesionalna sezona. Znam da će biti odličan kada stane na teren kada bude bilo važno", istakao je strateg Reala.
Potom se posvetio i Ognjenu Kuzmiću, koji je jedan deo karijere proveo upravo u dresu madridskog kluba."Svi u mojoj organizaciji vole Kuzmića. Toliko smo tužni što je dobio tu povredu prošle sezone nakon prvih par utakmica, oporavio se, pa opet vratio i onda se desila ta nezgoda. Ali sada sam srećan što se nalazi na terenu i mislim da će dosta pomoći Crvenoj zvezdi".
Real Madrid je uputio nekoliko šuteva u poslednjim sekundama utakmice, što se nije dopalo beogradskoj publici. Ipak, Pablo Laso ističe da je svaki poen važan i da se do samog kraja neće znati da li će baš jedan biti preloman za plej-of ili prednost domaćeg terena."Moraš da budeš siguran na kraju kada se sve srede svi poeni. Ne zna se da li će na kraju taj poen biti potreban i da li će Zvezda biti u borbi za plej-of. To je novi NBA stil koji se gaji, ako Zvezdu možemo da pobedimo sa 15 poena, pobedićemo je tako, a ne sa, recimo, 12".
Za kraj, Laso je novinare pozdravio u prilično prijatnom tonu."Zadovoljstvo mi je uvek da budem ovde", zaključio je strateg Reala.

Piše: 
Srđan TODOROVIĆ

Foto: 
Star Sport
text:
Laso: Some new NBA style is being cultivated, Nakic will be great
Real coach is in a good mood after his team wins in Belgrade

07 Nov 2019

The Red Star failed to win a new Euroleague triumph in front of a home crowd. They held on to the red and whites for three quarters, then sank completely in the beginning of the fourth, did not score points for the entire five minutes and allowed Real Madrid to leave Belgrade with uplifted hands.
Kraljevic's coach, Pablo Laso, was very talkative after his team won. He said that this difference may have been too big. "I would like to congratulate my team. After three games we were able to play well away. It was difficult in the first 30 minutes, but in the last quarter we were great, we had a lot It seemed as if everything had stopped in the last section, but the Red Star hit some hard shots before that and kept it in the game. In the end, these 15 points may be too big a difference, "said the Madrid strategist.
On the issue of the Euroleague favorite, Laso was puzzling. In fact, he pointed out that it was too early to make any predictions. "Do you think Fenerbahce is not a favorite? It is difficult for me in the Euroleague right now to say who is a favorite. It's a big fight for the playoffs now, to get in to the finish line and gain home field advantage, everything is equalized. It's too early to tell who is the favorite, it's very difficult to win every game, "Laso said.
Many wondered if Pablo Laso might have had too much credit with the referees throughout the game. "I didn't say anything in the first half, so if the referees thought I had enough credit, then I'm glad."
After that, there was talk of the young hopes of Real. First of all, tonight stood out Garuba, who with his great game of racket helped his team to victory. "I wish everyone could play in Real Madrid. I'm happy that we always have good players who jump out and push from the back. Garuba in the ACB league he starts almost constantly, he fights well at this level. That speaks well of our system, Garuba helps a lot and I hope my team helps him, "Laso said.
Then Laso touched on Mario Nakic, who claims he has a long way to go. "This may be the most difficult year of his career. When you play in the younger categories, everyone tells you how to play and how you know. great, he's yet to grow, this is his first professional season. I know he'll be great when he gets on the field when it matters, "the Real strategist noted.
He then dedicated himself to Ognjen Kuzmic, who spent one part of his career right in the jersey of the Madrid club. "Everyone in my organization loves Kuzmic. We are so sad that he got that injury last season after the first couple of games, recovered, then returned again and then that accident happened. But now I'm happy that he's on the field and I think it will help the Red Star a lot. "
Real Madrid made several shots in the final seconds of the match, which did not appeal to the Belgrade audience. Still, Pablo Laso points out that every point is important and it won't be known until the very end whether one will be the turning point for the playoffs or home field advantage. "You have to be sure in the end when all the points are settled. is that eventually that point will be needed and whether the Star will be in the playoff fight. It's a new NBA style that is being cultivated, if we can beat the Star by 15 points, we will beat it, not by, say , 12 ".
In conclusion, Lasso greeted the press in a rather pleasant tone. "It's a pleasure to always be here," the Real strategist concluded.

Writes:
Srdjan TODOROVIC

Photo:
Star Sport
